name: Canadian River Supply Anodized Aluminum Medium Transportation Cart
description: Roll, roll, roll your boat down to the beach or gently portage it over a variety of terrain. The tires are made from foam, so flats are a thing of the past. They've got the bounce and load-bearing of traditional pneumatic tires, but won't ever go flat  ̶  life is but a dream.Marine grade, anodized aluminum frame with stainless steel hardware.10-inch detachable wheels with polyurethane foam tires.Large foam bumpers protect hull finish.Sturdy kickstand for easy loading.Collapsible for easy storage, wheels remove quickly with clip pin.4-meter cam buckle tie-down strap included.Weight capacity is 68kg (150lbs), enough to handle a fully-loaded touring kayak.
